title: Mobile-Based Collaborative Mathematics Problem-Solving Workshop

context.additional_context: Learners engage in collaborative learning within a limited-technology environment with only smartphones, focusing on improving practical math skills for everyday problem-solving

learning_goals: Learners can explain the process of transforming real-life problems into mathematical formulas
Learners can derive problem-solving solutions with peers using mobile collaboration tools
Learners can present creative mathematical problem-solving strategies by group within a limited timeframe

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
